Package br.net.dd.netherwingcore.common.logging

package br.net.dd.netherwingcore.common.logging
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    br.net.dd.netherwingcore.common
     
  • Class
    Description
    DebugMessage
    A class representing a debug message within the application.
    Detail
    Represents a marker or contract for logging details within the Netherwing Core framework.
    ErrorMessage
    The ErrorMessage class represents a specialized type of Message that is used to log error-level messages in the system.
    FatalErrorMessage
    Represents a fatal error message in the system logging framework.
    InformationMessage
    Represents an informational message in the logging system.
    Level
    Represents the different levels of logging severity that can be used in the application.
    Log
    Provides functionalities for logging messages to various log files with different severity levels.
    LogFile
    Represents a log file target for logging messages.
    Message
    Represents a custom exception that can encapsulate additional details, including a logging level.
    TraceMessage
    Represents a trace message in the logging system.
    WarningMessage
    Represents a warning message in the logging system.
